roleset.name: think about
roleset.note: CONTEMPLATE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus; nominal 'contemplation' based on BOLT-6. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to think (about). (from contemplate.01-v)
CONTEMPLATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from contemplation.01-n)

example.name: contemplate-v: transitive
example.text: And with the company's recent announcement that it is contemplating a partial sale of its real estate, the values suddenly look poorer.
example.arg: a partial sale of its real estate

example.name: ARG2
example.text: I do not think he contemplated it as an eventuality which was to be imposed upon us.
example.arg: as an eventuality which was to be imposed upon us.

example.name: contemplation-n
example.text: I believe this is definitely something worthy of our serious contemplation .
